Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading

Class RepeatingKivaKitThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
      • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
        • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading.KivaKitThread
          • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.threading.RepeatingKivaKitThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation, Pausable, Startable, Stoppable, Receiver<Transmittable>, Transmitter<Transmittable>, Named, NamedObject, PackagePathed, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, java.lang.Runnable
    public class RepeatingKivaKitThread
extends KivaKitThread
implements Pausable
    A thread that repeatedly executes the KivaKitThread.onRun() method implementation at a given Frequency. The thread can be paused and resumed between executions of the user code.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static RepeatingKivaKitThread run​(Listener listener,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         Frequency every,
                                         java.lang.Runnable code)
        Returns:
        A started thread with the given name that will run the given code at the given frequency. Unlike KivaKitThread.repeat(java.lang.String, com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.time.Frequency, java.lang.Runnable), this thread can be paused and resumed.

      • run

        public static RepeatingKivaKitThread run​(Listener listener,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.Runnable code)
        Returns:
        A started thread with the given name that will run the given code repeatedly. Unlike KivaKitThread.repeat(java.lang.String, com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.time.Frequency, java.lang.Runnable), this thread can be paused and resumed.
